interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hot Cream 2 Pack, Belly Fat Burner Sweat Cream for Women and Men, Fat Burning Slimming Cream, Slim Weight Loss Cream, Anti-Cellulite Massage Cream for Body Shaping Waist, Abdomen and Buttocks
Review Date: 2021/09/15
Store: Purvigor
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Purvigor', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '2.1164 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 4.96 x 1.73 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Purvigor'}
Review Text: the package came in set of 2, using it before jogging and exercise in the morning even without those exercise i feel some heat from the gel but still at the point that it doesnt feel uncomfortable after finished 1 tube i feel some difference for the price its worth it to get another one
Review Title: Feels some heat but not hurting
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Electric Shaver for Men, SOOCAS Mens Electric Razor, Wet & Dry IPX7 Waterproof Rotary Facial Shaver, Portable Face Shaver Cordless Travel USB Rechargeable for Husband Dad, Black SOOCAS {'Brand': 'SOOCAS', 'Special Feature': 'Portable,Rechargeable,Cordless,Waterproof,Compact', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Charger', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 4.21 x 2.68 inches; 11.18 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'Manufacturer': 'SOOCAS'} i'm surprise about the quality of this shaver, for most part it cuts really well and smooth.
the design is compact and not that heavy on hand, the battery last quite long, and i like the USB-C charging so i can use 1 charging for all. the battery last long enough.
over all this shaver is affordable and great purchase Good inexpensive shaver Reusable Makeup Remover Pads| Dual- Texture Soft Reusable Face Microfiber Rounds For Mascara, Eye Shadow, Lipstick, Foundation (3 Pads+ Makeup Headband +Laundry Bag) TECHEALTH {'Product Dimensions': '11 x 7.5 x 2 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002480299'} The pads really soft and there's another side textured pads for "physical exfoliation" skin. It really removes all the makeup. really works removing makeup and have duo sides. Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Kneipp {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} I really enjoyed this soap. The scent is so good, its so practical change from gel to foam. I guess I used it too much for the first time, I only need 1 pump and spread it with loofah and that's enough for the whole body. The scent is so good, really practical change from gel to foam. 24K Gold Under Eye Mask– 20 Pairs- Under Eye Patches with Face Massager Roller, Anti-Aging Hyaluronic Acid Collagen Eye Masks for Dark Circles and Puffiness Dark Under Eyes Treatment FRLEDM {'Brand': 'FRLEDM', 'Special Feature': 'Anti Aging', 'Unit Count': '21.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '40', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 7 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)'} I don't really interested in face roller but I feel the eye masks really worth it and decrease puffiness. Especially after put it in the fridge. Eye masks really worth it, face roller not so much. Avajar Whitening A-Solution Mask 10 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks | Moisturizing Face Mask| Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Skin Whitening', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.28 x 1.57 x 6.89 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} After I took off the mask 20 mins, skin really bright, soft, and moisturizing! It is sticky though so I have to rinse it with water and put night cream after. But it's so worth it. Really brightening and moisturizing. WIS Acne Skin Pleiotropic Conditioning Face Mask Acne Scar Remover & zit Treatment & Blemish Fightting & Reduce Pores | Organic Mask Care Acne Prone skin-24 Pcs +WIS+ {'Brand': '+WIS+', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.07 x 4.61 x 3.66 inches; 1.83 Pounds'} So far, it doesn't make me breakout. Moisturizing yet powerful ingredients for acne prone skin. NeoCell Overnighter Collagen, 9.3oz NeoCell {'Brand': 'NeoCell', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin c,zinc', 'Unit Count': '9.3 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.55 x 5.08 x 3.46 inches; 9.3 Ounces', 'UPC': '016185130623'} I have been taking this for 2 weeks nightly now and I can tell the difference in my skin and hair feeling softer. I have sores on my arm and they have been healing faster.My skin feel smoother and less breakouts and my fingernails are starting to lose the ridges on them and look so much stronger. For the restful sleep benefit, I didn't feel any difference as I don't have sleep problem. One hour before bedtime ritual drink. Smell less chemical and the polish easy to remove. But after that its okay. Good night cream, no sticky. actual_interaction.title_meta: Hot Cream 2 Pack, Belly Fat Burner Sweat Cream for Women and Men, Fat Burning Slimming Cream, Slim Weight Loss Cream, Anti-Cellulite Massage Cream for Body Shaping Waist, Abdomen and Buttocks
features: 【Amazing Fat Burning Cream】-Our hot sweat cream helps achieve a flat belly, a sculptural figure free or stretch marks and accumulating grease & it also reduces the appearance of cellulite, penetrates the pores eliminating excess fatty tissue.

【Easy Absorbed Natural Ingredients】-Our weight loss cream is made with no chemicals just natural ingredients include antioxidants & Vitamin E A D for sensitive skin. Our formula ensures your body to burn fat while limiting cellulite & strengthening skin for a youthful appearance.

【SHAPE PERFECT BODY】-Our slim cream is hydrating, moisturizing, and easy to be absorbed by skin. It has great effect on slimming waist, legs, arms and firming abdomen. Nourishing skin to make it smooth and tender. Moreover, it helps to shape nice and attractive body.

【Rich Texture】-Ideal for extremely dry, rough, bumpy skin. opens skin pores for improved circulation, targets sweat glands to, increase perspiration, accelerates warm-up and recovery time.Accelerate blood circulation, promote the body's metabolic function, enhance muscle and promote good health.Improve cellulite to make skin smooth and delicate.

【Caution】-Although rare, burning or irritation may occur. Test a small amount on skin first. If uncomfortable or causes irritation, please discontinue use. Only apply onto intact skin. Wash hands after use. Keep out of reach of children and pets
